content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences, but based on the information available, I would recommend taking an archipelago cruise. Turku archipelago has hundreds of islands and the natural beauty is simply stunning. The archipelago cruise is an excellent way to see the beautiful scenery and wildlife of the region, and it's one of the most popular outdoor activities to do in Turku during the summer months. You can choose a guided tour or rent a boat to explore on your own. Either way, you'll have an unforgettable experience surrounded by nature.
